1982 janadhipathiwaranaya jayagath je aar jayawardhana mahatha widhayaka janadhipathi lesa nawatha warak pathwuna.chanden dawas deka thunakata passe eka niwadu dawasaka mama gedara iddi rosalin ape gedara aawa.rosalin kiyala kiwwe bi rod eke thaniyama jiwathwena wadimahalu kanthawak.ayata tharamak nuhugune thibuna.sathiyakata dekakata sarayak ape gedara,ethakota mayakkalage gedara awith dawasa deka indala yanaeka age sirithak.rosalinwa bayit ekata ganna puluwan nisa aya yana ena eka gana ape akamaththak thibuneth na.eda mama kussiyata yaddi rosalin ape ammath ekka bara kathawak.
